nodeList.nodeDescription: Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

nodeList.description: While in Reaper Form, you deal increased damage but have reduced healing effectiveness.
nodeList.nodeDescription: While in Reaper Form you have [10%] reduced healing effectiveness and [20%] increased damage per point.

node.nodeDescription: Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

nodeList.description: You move faster for 4 seconds after using {Reap} while below half health.
nodeList.nodeDescription: You gain [2%] increased movespeed per point for 4 seconds when you use Reap below 50% health.

node.nodeDescription: Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

nodeList.description: You leech a portion of the damage {Reap} hits deal as health.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Reap leeches [1%] of damage dealt as health per point.

node.altText: {Mark for Death} is a curse that lasts for 8 seconds and reduces all resistances by 25%. It cannot stack.
node.description: While in Reaper Form, you have a chance apply {Mark For Death} to enemies on hit. This chance is doubled for {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: While in Reaper Form you have +[5%] chance per point to mark enemies for death on hit. This chance is doubled for Reap.

node.description: While in Reaper Form, you deal additional necrotic damage. This bonus is doubled for {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: While in Reaper Form you deal +[2] necrotic damage per point with spells and melee attacks. This bonus is doubled for Reap.
Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

node.description: While in Reaper Form you gain health from kills. This bonus is doubled for kills using {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: [5] health gained on kill per point while in Reaper Form. This bonus is doubled for Reap.

node.altText: You are at low health when your current health is below 35% of your maximum health.
node.description: {Reap} deal more damage for each percent of health you are missing (multiplicative with other modifiers). You deal increased damage at low health while in Reaper Form.
node.nodeDescription:
Reap deals [1%] more damage per point for each 1% of health you are missing (multiplicative with other modifiers)

You deal [25%] increased damage per point while at low health in Reaper Form

node.description: While in Reaper Form, you deal increased damage and have increased critical strike chance, but lose health when you kill an enemy.
node.nodeDescription:
Whenever you kill an enemy while in Reaper Form, lose [0.5%] of your current health per point. 

You have [25%] increased damage and critical strike chance per point while in Reaper Form.

nodeList.description: {Reap} hits instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold (a percentage of their maximum health).

node.description: You have a chance to cast {Hungering Souls} whenever you kill an enemy with {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: Whenever you kill an enemy with Reap, you have a [5%] chance per point to cast Hungering Souls.

node.description: Gain a stack of {Reaper’s Ascendance} every 5 seconds you spend in Reaper Form, which grants you increased spell damage. You can have up to 25 stacks of Reaper’s Ascendance at a time.
node.nodeDescription: Gain [1%] increased spell damage per point for every 5 seconds you spend in Reaper Form. Max [25%] per point.

node.nodeDescription: You gain [2%] increased movespeed per point for 4 seconds when you use Reap below 50% health.
Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

node.altText: You are at low health when your current health is below 35% of your maximum health.
node.description: {Reap} deal more damage for each percent of health you are missing (multiplicative with other modifiers). You deal increased damage at low health while in Reaper Form.
node.nodeDescription:
Reap deals [1%] more damage per point for each 1% of health you are missing (multiplicative with other modifiers)

You deal [25%] increased damage per point while at low health in Reaper Form

node.description: While in Reaper Form you gain health from kills. This bonus is doubled for kills using {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: [5] health gained on kill per point while in Reaper Form. This bonus is doubled for Reap.

node.description: You leech a portion of the damage {Reap} hits deal as health.
node.nodeDescription: Reap leeches [1%] of damage dealt as health per point.

node.altText: {Mark for Death} is a curse that lasts for 8 seconds and reduces all resistances by 25%. It cannot stack.
node.description: While in Reaper Form, you have a chance apply {Mark For Death} to enemies on hit. This chance is doubled for {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: While in Reaper Form you have +[5%] chance per point to mark enemies for death on hit. This chance is doubled for Reap.

node.description: While in Reaper Form, you deal additional necrotic damage. This bonus is doubled for {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: While in Reaper Form you deal +[2] necrotic damage per point with spells and melee attacks. This bonus is doubled for Reap.
Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

nodeList.description: Gain a stack of {Reaper’s Ascendance} every 5 seconds you spend in Reaper Form, which grants you increased spell damage. You can have up to 25 stacks of Reaper’s Ascendance at a time.

node.description: You have a chance to cast {Hungering Souls} whenever you kill an enemy with {Reap}.

node.description: You move faster for 4 seconds after using {Reap} while below half health.
node.nodeDescription: You gain [2%] increased movespeed per point for 4 seconds when you use Reap below 50% health.
Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

stats.statName: Reap Damage Per Missing Health Percent

nodeList.description: While in Reaper Form, potions grant twice as much health as normal.
nodeList.nodeDescription: While you are in Reaper Form potions restore twice as much health

node.description: While in Reaper Form, you gain additional armor proportional to your intelligence.
node.nodeDescription: While in Reaper Form you have +[1] armour per point for each point of intelligence

node.description: While in Reaper Form, your health decays more slowly and you deal increased damage over time.
node.nodeDescription:
While in Reaper Form, your health decays [10%] slower per point.

[10%] increased damage over time per point while in Reaper Form
Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

nodeList.description: You gain ward when entering Reaper Form.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Gain [40] ward per point when you transform into Reaper Form.

node.description: While in Reaper Form, you deal increased damage and have increased critical strike chance, but lose health when you kill an enemy.
node.nodeDescription:
Whenever you kill an enemy while in Reaper Form, lose [0.5%] of your current health per point. 

You have [25%] increased damage and critical strike chance per point while in Reaper Form.

node.description: While in Reaper Form, you deal increased damage but have reduced healing effectiveness.
node.nodeDescription: While in Reaper Form you have [10%] reduced healing effectiveness and [20%] increased damage per point.
Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

node.description: You move faster for 4 seconds after using {Reap} while below half health.
node.nodeDescription: You gain [2%] increased movespeed per point for 4 seconds when you use Reap below 50% health.
Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

node.altText: You are at low health when your current health is below 35% of your maximum health.
node.description: {Reap} deal more damage for each percent of health you are missing (multiplicative with other modifiers). You deal increased damage at low health while in Reaper Form.
node.nodeDescription:
Reap deals [1%] more damage per point for each 1% of health you are missing (multiplicative with other modifiers)

You deal [25%] increased damage per point while at low health in Reaper Form

node.description: While in Reaper Form you gain health from kills. This bonus is doubled for kills using {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: [5] health gained on kill per point while in Reaper Form. This bonus is doubled for Reap.

node.description: You leech a portion of the damage {Reap} hits deal as health.
node.nodeDescription: Reap leeches [1%] of damage dealt as health per point.

node.altText: {Mark for Death} is a curse that lasts for 8 seconds and reduces all resistances by 25%. It cannot stack.
node.description: While in Reaper Form, you have a chance apply {Mark For Death} to enemies on hit. This chance is doubled for {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: While in Reaper Form you have +[5%] chance per point to mark enemies for death on hit. This chance is doubled for Reap.

node.description: While in Reaper Form, you deal additional necrotic damage. This bonus is doubled for {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: While in Reaper Form you deal +[2] necrotic damage per point with spells and melee attacks. This bonus is doubled for Reap.
Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

stats.statName: Reap Damage Per Missing Health Percent

nodeList.description: Hitting minions with {Reap} heals them for the same amount that Reap would heal you if an enemy was hit.
nodeList.nodeDescription: When you hit a minion with Reap you heal them for the same amount that Reap would heal you if you hit an enemy.

node.description: While in Reaper Form you have increased healing effectiveness and leech more of the damage you deal. You gain additional health on hit with {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription:
Reap restores [2] additional health on hit per point

While you are in Reaper Form you have [10%] increased healing effectiveness and health leech per point

node.description: While in Reaper Form, your health decays more slowly and you deal increased damage over time.
node.nodeDescription:
While in Reaper Form, your health decays [10%] slower per point.

[10%] increased damage over time per point while in Reaper Form
Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.

node.description: Gain a stack of {Reaper’s Ascendance} every 5 seconds you spend in Reaper Form, which grants you increased spell damage. You can have up to 25 stacks of Reaper’s Ascendance at a time.
node.nodeDescription: Gain [1%] increased spell damage per point for every 5 seconds you spend in Reaper Form. Max [25%] per point.

node.description: You have a chance to cast {Hungering Souls} whenever you kill an enemy with {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: Whenever you kill an enemy with Reap, you have a [5%] chance per point to cast Hungering Souls.

node.altText: If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node then the highest threshold is used.
node.description: {Reap} hits instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold (a percentage of their maximum health).
node.nodeDescription: Reap instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold ([6%] of their maximum health per point).

node.description: While in Reaper Form, you deal additional necrotic damage. This bonus is doubled for {Reap}.
node.nodeDescription: While in Reaper Form you deal +[2] necrotic damage per point with spells and melee attacks. This bonus is doubled for Reap.
Transform into the Reaper, gaining an extra health bar and a new ability, Reap. Reap dashes and heals you for enemies hit. You return to human form when your health bar depletes.
